alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 3:28PM EST until February 24 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Greater amounts possible over higher terrain between Tapiola and Mass City along M-26. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph could result in brief whiteout conditions, especially for exposed areas along Lake Superior. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM Thursday to midnight EST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
